steps.title: Competition scores
steps.data: Found to the right of the date on competition cards- howth data is always on the left!

steps.title: Refreshing
steps.data: There is no need- all data is always up to date.

steps.title: Competition details
steps.data: At the top middle of a specific competition page: location, date & lastly the time.

steps.title: Searching for a competition
steps.data: In the Competitions page, hit the magnifying glass icon in the top right & enter search text.

steps.title: More hole data
steps.data: In a competition page, you can click on an individual hole to see extra information or (if you have access) update scores/hole data.

steps.title: Go to the competitions page
steps.data: Click the home icon in the top right corner of this page to return to the Competitions page.

steps.title: Locate your competition
steps.data: Scroll through the current & archived competitions to find your competition.

steps.title: Click on the competition
steps.data: Tap anywhere on it's card to enter page with the details of your competition.

steps.title: Show the text field
steps.data: Click the admin icon in the top right corner of the page. A text field should appear.

steps.title: Enter your code
steps.data: Click on the text field that has appeared & type in your competition code.

steps.title: Submit entered code
steps.data: Click the check icon in the top right corner of the page. The text field vanishes.

steps.title: Go to the app help page
steps.data: Click the arrow icon in the top left corner of this page to go back to the App Help page.

steps.title: Show the text field
steps.data: Click the admin icon in the top right corner of the page. A text field should appear.

steps.title: Enter your admin code
steps.data: Click on the text field that has appeared & type in your admin code.

steps.title: Submit entered code
steps.data: Click the check icon in the top right corner of the page. The text field vanishes.

steps.title: Add a hole
steps.data: In a competition page, click the button at the bottom. Fill out the required information and hit the check icon in the top right.

steps.title: Remove a hole
steps.data: Click on the hole you want to remove. In the drop-down that appears, click the delete icon (below the edit icon) in the bottom left.

steps.title: Modify a hole
steps.data: Click on the hole you want to modify. In the drop-down that appears, click the edit icon (above the delete icon) in the top left.

steps.title: Updating hole numbers / scores
steps.data: Click on the hole you want to modify. In the drop-down that appears, there will be 3 sets of plus/minus icons. They are vertically aligned with the number that they modify.

steps.title: Add a competition
steps.data: In the competitions page, click the button at the bottom. Fill out the required information and hit the check icon in the top right.

steps.title: Remove a competition
steps.data: In the competitions page, each card will have a remove icon on the bottom right of it. Click this icon to remove the associated competition.

steps.title: Modify a competition
steps.data: In the competitions page, each card will have a edit icon on the top right of it. Click this icon to modify the associated competition.

steps.title: Add a manager
steps.data: In a competition page, the last competition detail is a 6-digit code. Give this to the future-manager to type into their app to gain access to the associated competition while the competition is current.
